Thank you for your great support!â¨â From the makers of Stick Stunt Biker, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer, Line Runner, RunStickRun and moreâ¨â¨Get your kicks and jump down the highest and most dangerous cliffs all over the planet!â¨Perform different jump styles and get rated by the five judges.â¨Fulfill the requested handicap to qualify for the next jump.â¨â¨FEATURES:â¨â¢ Cliffs up to 125 meters highâ¨â¢ Unique gameplayâ¨â¢ Different jump typesâ¨â¢ Continue last gameâ¨â¢ Bonus points for good or even perfect jumpsâ¨â¢ Smoothest stick animationsâ¨â¢ Tutorialâ¨â¨Feel free to post your ideas, we will try to implement them as soon as possibleâ¨.â¨Thank you very much for all your support and interest in our games! We would love to hear your suggestions!PERFORMANCE HINT:If you have performance problems or the game is running slow on your device make sure you disable display power saving

reviews.title: Dirts McNasty
reviews.comment: This game is so awesome its not funny, for anyone who has been a diver before will enjoy this game greatly! Also it is extremely addicting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great simple game. Thanks
reviews.author: Keith Griffiths

reviews.title: Time killer
reviews.comment: Excellent game amazing on galaxy note 2. Really wish there was a free dive mode where you could dive from a height of your choice.
reviews.author: Jon o\'connor

reviews.title: Killer game!
reviews.comment: Very fun game and easy to use!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t get old
reviews.comment: It\'s a great game to play when you need to pass the time!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Why am I getting full page pop up ads? I believe this is actually what I paid for to avoid...

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This game is very fun to play
reviews.author: F Ferrara

reviews.title: Waist of 2 dollars
reviews.comment: The game is barely anything. All it has are 2 actions; jump and summer Sault.
reviews.author: Raptor Jessus

reviews.title: Entertaining
reviews.comment: Love it! Very addictive.
reviews.author: teofilo vasco

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Fun game.
reviews.author: Lance Moore

reviews.title: Most addictive game on the Google Play store delete
reviews.comment: I can\'t put it down. Once I downloaded it took over my life. There needs to be more games like stick man diving, simple , but underly addicting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A bit miss-leading not worth paying \302\2431.20 for one extra coin .
reviews.comment: Loved the free version so much i thought id by the paid version thinking there would be more extras. Nope, u get one extra coin for the \302\2431.20 u pay for full version . I thought u would be able to save where u were in the game but no not even that. Think i will try for a refund and stick with the free version. Come on developer please add more additions to what could be one of the best games on the market. like a few people have commented at least add a save point so u don\'t keep going back to the start.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No more jumps
reviews.comment: I thought buying the cost version would give a better verity of jumps... nope just frontflips backflips and headers... kinda sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: Awesome game once you get the mechanics down its pretty simple but the upper levels get challenging, still can\'t get past 20
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stick man \"JUMP\"
reviews.comment: VERY FUN game. I loved watching diving in the Olympics now I\'m loving playing this game..

reviews.comment: Such a simple hey addicting game.

reviews.comment: Simple and addicting, smooth running processes

reviews.title: No save
reviews.comment: It\'s fun but allow a little room to continue from where you left off in case you\'re on a hot streak and you gotta be some where...

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Best game I have ever played for phones. Works great on my Samsung galaxy ace, well worth the money!
